content: in a court case the tallinn district court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but legal aid provided by the state will be covered on behalf of the affected person the court has annulled a previous ruling and made a new regulation the parties involved have agreed to divide the assets of the deceased person including a vehicle pension funds a limited liability company and real estate they have also agreed to withdraw funds from a bank account and register a vehicle in one persons name they have given consent for certain actions to be taken on behalf of a minor child coowners x and c are being removed from the ownership of a property and will be entered as new coowners of a different property they have given their consent and deposited the money received from the division of the inheritance into a bank account the costs of the legal proceedings will be borne by the parties involved an appeal can be made to the supreme court within 15 days the petitioner has submitted an application to obtain consent on behalf of a minor child for the division of inheritance assets the court has granted the application and given consent to the petitioner to manage a company an inventory of succession assets was conducted and no heirs have challenged it the county court granted the application for the division of assets the petitioner filed an appeal regarding the distribution of procedural costs the district court annulled the county courts ruling and made a new ruling that the costs should be borne by the parties involved the district court also determined that the petitioner should not bear the procedural costs and these costs should be justified by the guardianship institution the distribution of procedural costs will be determined by the appealing court decision

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, except for legal aid provided and borne by the state on behalf of affected person I, all unspecified amounts
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares
metadata.relationship_between_parties: parents of the concerned person I
